SA11sanss11u:1: tad evam ugradattaparipṛcchāvidhinā gṛhadoṣān bhāvayitvā śrutavatā cittaṃ śodhayitum araṇyam āśrayaṇīyam iti sthitaṃ //
SA11sanss11u:3: na jātu kāmān pratiṣevamāṇaḥ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇāṃ /
SA11sanss11u:4: gṛhaṃ ca sevitva jugupsanīyam anuttarāṃ prāpsyati so 'grabodhim //
SA11sanss11u:5: ye kāma varjenti yathâgnikarṣūṃ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇāṃ /
SA11sanss11u:6: uttasta gehād abhiniṣkramanti na durlabhā teṣv iyam agrabodhiḥ //
SA11sanss11u:7: na kaści buddhaḥ purimeṇâsīd anāgato bheṣyati yo 'vatiṣṭhate /
SA11sanss11u:11: jyaṃ yatha kheṭapiṇḍaṃ vased araṇyeṣu vivekakāmaḥ /
SA11sanss11u:12: kleśān prahāya vinihatya mānaṃ budhyanti bodhiṃ virajām asaṃskṛtām //
SA11sanss11u:14: annehi pānehi ca cīvarehi puṣpehi gandhehi vilepanehi /
SA11sanss11u:15: nôpasthitā bhonti narôttamā jinā yatha pravrajitvā caramāṇadharmān //
SA11sanss11u:16: yaś câiva bodhiṃ pratikāṅkṣamāṇaḥ satvârtha nirviṇṇa kusaṃskṛtātaḥ /
SA11sanss11u:17: araṇyâbhimukha sapta padāni gacched ayaṃ tataḥ puṇyaviśiṣṭa bhoti //
SA11sanss11u:18: yadi punar visabhāgasatvânunayāt pariṣatkāmatayā vā lābhâdikāmatayā vā vivekapraveśe vilambeta /
SA11sanss11u:21: na vijña bālehi karonti vigrahaṃ satkṛtya bālān parivarjayanti /
SA11sanss11u:22: mamântike cêti praduṣṭacittā na bāladharmehi karonti saṃstavam //
SA11sanss11u:23: na vijña bālāna karoti sevanāṃ viditva bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim /
SA11sanss11u:24: kiyacciraṃ bālasusevitā pi puno 'pi te bhonti amitrasannibhāḥ //
SA11sanss11u:25: na vijña bāleṣv iha viśvasanti vijñāya bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim /
SA11sanss11u:26: svabhāvabhinnā prakṛtīya bālāḥ kuto 'sti mitraṃ hi pṛthagjanānāṃ //
SA11sanss11u:27: sahadhārmikeno vacanenôktāḥ krodhaṃ ca doṣaṃ câpratyayaṃ ca /
SA11sanss11u:28: prāviṣkarontîmi bāladharmêmam artha vijñāya na viśvasanti //
SA11sanss11u:29: bālā hi bālehi samaṃ samenti yathâmedhyenâmedhya sārddham /
SA11sanss11u:30: vijñaḥ punar vijñajanena sārddhaṃ samenti sarpir yatha sarpimaṇḍe //
SA11sanss11u:32: sūsukhitāḥ sada te naraloke yeṣu priyâpriya nâsti kahiṃcit /
SA11sanss11u:33: ye ca na kandarake 'bhiramante śrāmaṇakaṃ susukhaṃ anubhonti //
SA11sanss11u:36: khaḍgasamā vicaranti mu lokaṃ gagane pavana yathêva vrajanti //
SA11sanss11u:38: syuḥ sukhitā vata te naraloke yeṣu na sajjati mānasa loke /
SA11sanss11u:39: vāyusamaṃ sada teṣv iha cittaṃ nô ca priyâpriya vidyati saṃgo //
SA11sanss11u:40: apriya ye dukhitehi nivāso ye 'pi priyā dukhitehi viyogo /
SA11sanss11u:41: antôbhe 'pi tehi jahitvā te sukhitā naraye rata dharme //
SA11sanss11u:43: bhavati satatam alpakṛtyayogī pṛthu guṇa doṣata sarvi varjayitvā /
SA11sanss11u:46: kadāci yuktayogîmi guṇa tasya bhavanty araṇyavāse //
SA11sanss11u:47: sada bhavati niviṇṇa saṃskṛte 'sau na bhavati tasya pṛhā kahiṃci loke /
SA11sanss11u:48: na ca bhavati vivṛddhir āsravāṇāṃ vanavasato 'sya bhavanti ānuśaṃsāḥ //
SA11sanss11u:49: adhikaraṇa na tasya jātu bhotī sadôpaśāntarato vivekacārī /
SA11sanss11u:50: vacaci manasi kāya saṃvṛtasyo bahuguṇa tasya bhavanty araṇyavāse //
SA11sanss11u:51: bhavati anukūla tasya mokṣo laghu pratividhyati so 'dhimukti śāntām /
SA11sanss11u:52: vanicari dhimukti sevate 'syêmi guṇa bhonty araṇyavāsi sarve //
SA11sanss11u:54: vanaṣaṇḍa sevatha vivikta sadā vijahitva grāmanagareṣu ratim /
SA11sanss11u:55: advitīyakhaḍgasama bhotha sadā na cireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram /
SA11sanss11u:60: te 'raṇye ratim āpnuvanti guṇinaḥ śāntêndriyāḥ sūratāḥ //
SA11sanss11u:61: na strīsaṃbhava nâiva câpi puruṣais teṣāṃ kvacid vidyate /
SA11sanss11u:63: lābhair nâpi ca teṣu harṣa svamano līyanty alābhair na ca /
SA11sanss11u:67: satvasaṃsargo me na kartavyo na hi mayâikasatvasya kuśalamūlāni saṃjanayitavyānîty ādi //
SA11sanss11u:68: yadi punaḥ śrutavān imāṃ kṣaṇasaṃpadam āsādya lābhâdau saktaḥ cittaṃ na śodhayet sâivâikaḥ /
SA11sanss11u:71: tad yathā kāśyapa kaścid eva puruṣo mahatôdakârṇavenôhyamānôdakatṛṣṇayā kālaṃ kuryād /
SA11sanss11u:72: evam eva kāśyapêhâike śramaṇabrāhmaṇā bahūn dharmān udgṛhya paryavāpya na rāgatṛṣṇāṃ vinodayanti /
SA11sanss11u:79: yeṣu ca sthāneṣu nâtidūre piṇḍapātagocaro bhavati na
SA11sanss11u:82: yeṣu pānīyāni bhavanty acchāni śucīni nirmalāny alpâyāsāni mukhaparibhogāni yā-
SA11sanss11u:84_0: ni ca sthānāni vṛkṣasaṃpannāni bhavanti puṣpasaṃpannāni phalasaṃpannāni pattrasaṃpannāny
SA11sanss11u:85_0: sa teṣu sthāneṣv āśrito yad anena pūrvapaṭhitaṃ bhavati tat tribhī rātrais trirdivasasya
SA11sanss11u:85_1: svâdhyāyati nâtyuccena svareṇa nâtinīcena nôddhatair indriyair na bahirgatena cittena
SA11sanss11u:85_2: prasādam upajīvan grantham upadhārayan nimittāny udgṛhṇan middham apakrāman /
SA11sanss11u:86: saced āraṇyakasya bhikṣo rājā vôpasaṃkrāmati rājamātro vânye vā brāhmaṇakṣatriyanaigamajānapadāḥ /
SA11sanss11u:93: tasya te mahārāja lābhāḥ sulabdhā yasya te bhūpradeśe śīlavanto guṇavanto bahuśrutāḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ prativasanti /
SA11sanss11u:95: sacet sthiro bhavati vinītaḥ praśāntêndriyaḥ bhavyaś ca bhavati dharmadeśanāyāḥ tato 'sya vicitrā dharmadeśanôpasaṃhartavyā /
SA11sanss11u:98: sacet saṃvegânukūlāṃ na priyāyate udārôdārāṇi tathāgatamāhātmyāni upadeṣṭavyāni /
SA11sanss11u:100: sâivaṃ bahuśrutaḥ san pratibalo bhavati dhārmaśravaṇikānāṃ cittam ārādhayituṃ /
SA11sanss11u:101: te ca satvās tasyântike prītiṃ ca prasādaṃ ca prāmodyaṃ ca pratilabhantae iti //
SA11sanss11u:104: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenâraṇye prativasatâivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:113: api tu khalu punar ahaṃ yasyârthāyâraṇye prativasāmi sa mayârthaḥ paripūrayitavyo yad uta śrāmaṇyârthaḥ //
SA11sanss11u:115: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenâraṇye viharatâivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:128: anitye nityêti viparyāsabhayabhīto 'nātmany ātmêti viparyāsabhayabhīto 'śucau śucir iti viparyāsabhayabhīto /
SA11sanss11u:133_1: śrutam iti bhayabhīto 'mate matam iti bhayabhīto 'vijñāte vijñātam iti bhayabhīto
SA11sanss11u:134: tâibhyo hy aham evaṃrūpebhyo bhayabhairavebhyo bhīto 'raṇyâvāsam upagataḥ //
SA11sanss11u:136: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenâraṇyavāsasthitena bhītena vā trastena vâivaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:137: yāni kānicid bhayāny utpadyante sarvāṇi tāny ātmagrāhatôtpadyante //
SA11sanss11u:139: sacet punar aham araṇye prativasan nâtmagrāhaṃ parityajeyaṃ nâtmâbhiniveśaṃ nâtmaparigrahaṃ nâtmanidānaṃ nâtmatṛṣṇāṃ nâtmasaṃjñāṃ nâtmavādôpādānaṃ nâtmadṛ-
SA11sanss11u:143: api tu khalu punar gṛhapate nâsty ātmasaṃjñino 'raṇyavāso /
SA11sanss11u:146: araṇyavāso nāma gṛhapate ucyate sarvadharmeṣv asaṃbhavavāsaḥ sarvadharmeṣv asaṃgavāsaḥ //
SA11sanss11u:148: tad yathā gṛhapate 'raṇye tṛṇagulmâuṣadhivanaspatayaḥ prativasanto na bibhyati nôttrasyanti na saṃtrasyanti na saṃtrāsam āpadyante /
SA11sanss11u:149: evam eva gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenâraṇye viharatā tṛṇagulmâuṣadhivanaspatikāṣṭhakuḍyavad ātmapratibhāsavat saṃjñā kāye utpādayitavyā /
SA11sanss11u:153: tena bhayabhītena vā trastena vâivaṃ yoniśaḥ kāyôpaparīkṣitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss11u:154: nâsty atra kāye ātmā vā satvo vā jīvo vā poṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo vā /
SA11sanss11u:158: evam evâmamenâparigraheṇâraṇyam eva sarvadharmêti jñātvôpasampadya vihartavyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:162: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvena buddhânujñāto 'raṇyavāsêti jñātvâraṇye vastavyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:166: sacet punar gṛhapate pravrajito bodhisatvôddeśasvâdhyāyârthaṃ gaṇam avatarati /
SA11sanss11u:167_0: tena tatra sagauraveṇa bhavitavyaṃ sapratīsenâcāryôpādhyāyeṣu sthaviramadhyanavakeṣu
SA11sanss11u:167_1: bhikṣuṣu pradakṣiṇabhavitavyam analasena svayaṃkāriṇâparôpatāpinā na ca tenôpasthānagurukeṇa bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:169: tathāgato 'py arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sadevasya lokasya sa-
SA11sanss11u:171: mārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pūjito dakṣiṇīyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ /
SA11sanss11u:172: so 'pi tāvan na kasyacit sakāśād upasthānaṃ svīkaroti /
SA11sanss11u:176: api tu vayam eva sarvasatvānām upasthāyakā bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
SA11sanss11u:177: vayam eva pareṣām upasthānaparicaryāṃ kariṣyāmo na ca punaḥ kasyacit sakāśād upasthānaparicaryāṃ svīkariṣyāmaḥ /
SA11sanss11u:179: upasthānagurukasya hi gṛhapate bhikṣor guṇadharmânugraho naśyati /
SA11sanss11u:180: yeṣāṃ ca saṃgrahaṃ karoti teṣām evaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss11u:183_1: vā glānaparipṛcchako vā grāmântikaṃ śayanâsanam āgacchet tena sâyam āgamanāya prakramaṇāya
SA11sanss11u:184: sacet punar asya parapratibaddhôddeśaḥ svâdhyāyo vā tena vihāre prativasatâraṇyapravaṇacittena bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:185: eṣâiva tasyâraṇyavāso yat sarvavastuṣv araṇyasaṃjñā dharmaparyeṣṭyā câtṛptêti //
SA11sanss11u:187: yadi punar asya tatrâraṇyâyatane viharato 'prāptaphalapṛthagjanasya vyāḍamṛgâgaccheyuḥ /
SA11sanss11u:188: tena tatra na bhayaṃ na trāsôtpādayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss11u:193: api tu maitrīm utpādayitvā doṣaṃ vivarjayiṣyāmi bhayam apanayiṣyāmi /
SA11sanss11u:194: yady evam api kṛtvā te vyāḍamṛgā māṃ jīvitād vyaparopya bhuñjīran /
SA11sanss11u:196: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me 'sārāt kāyāt sāram ādattaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanss11u:197: na punar ime vyāḍamṛgāḥ śakyā mayâmiṣeṇa toṣayituṃ mama māṃsaṃ bhakṣayitvā sukhasparśaṃ vihariṣyanti //
SA11sanss11u:198: pe //yadi punas tatrâraṇyâyatane viharato 'manuṣyôpasaṃkramiṣyanti suvarṇā vā durvarṇā vā /
SA11sanss11u:203: tatra tenâraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā yathāśakti yathābalaṃ yathādharmâdhigamāya tāsāṃ devatānāṃ-
SA11sanss11u:206: yadi punas tāvaṅ gambhīrān praśnān paripṛccheyur yān sâraṇyako bhikṣur na śaknuyād visarjayituṃ /
SA11sanss11u:207: tena nirmānena bhūtvā vāg bhāṣitavyâśikṣito na paribhavitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss11u:209: bhaviṣyati sa kālaḥ sa samayo yadâdhigatān dharmān śrutvā sarvakathāṃ visarjayiṣyāmi /
SA11sanss11u:212: pe //tena tatrâraṇyâyatane prativasatā tṛṇagulmâuṣadhivanaspatīnāṃ nimittaṃ grahītavyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:214: yathâiṣāṃ bhāvanām asvāmikānām amamānām aparigrahāṇām evaṃ niśceṣṭānāṃ nirvyāpārāṇāṃ bhavaty utpādo bhaṅgaś ca /
SA11sanss11u:217: evam evâyaṃ kāyas tṛṇakāṣṭhakuḍyapratibhāsôpamo 'svāmiko 'mamo 'parigraho niśceṣṭo nirvyāpāro hetupratyayayuktyôtpadyate /
SA11sanss11u:219: na punar atra kaścid dharmaḥ paramârthata*utpadyate vā nirudhyate vêti //
SA11sanss11u:223: na me kaścit sahāyo yo māṃ sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vā codayet /
SA11sanss11u:224: api tu khalu punaḥ santîme devanāgayakṣā buddhāś ca bhagavanto ye mama cittâśayaṃ jānanti /
SA11sanss11u:226: so 'ham ihâraṇyâyatane prativasann akuśalacittasya vaśaṃ gacchāmi /
SA11sanss11u:227: yadi punar aham iyaddūram āgatâiko 'dvitīyo 'saṃstabdho 'mamo 'parigrahaḥ kāmavitarkaṃ vā vitarkayeyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:228: vyāpaādaṃ vihinsāvitarkaṃ vā vitarkayeyam anyaṃ vâkuśalavitarkaṃ vitarkayeyaṃ /
SA11sanss11u:230: te ca me devanāgayakṣā visaṃvāditāḥ buddhāś ca bhagavanto 'nabhirāddhā bhaviṣyantîti //
